skins.selfIntroduction: I am Sirius, the 5th ship in the 2nd group of the Royal Navy's Dido-class of light cruisers. I participated in Operation Pedestal in the past, but now I serve as a Royal Maid and have the privilege of fighting for my honourable Master.
skins.acquisition: It is an honour to meet you. I am Sirius of the Royal Maids, here to assume the position. Henceforth, Master, I shall serve you to protect your glory and your beliefs.
skins.login: It is good to see you return, my honourable Master.
skins.details: My honourable Master, what would you like to learn more about today? Literature and culture? Logistics and strategy? The fine arts? Or, perhaps, you are more interested in more... carnal knowledge...?
skins.secretaryIdle1: "Cleaning"...? If it is combat you are referring to, then I vow to meet all expectations you set for me, my honourable Master.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Regardless of what may ever happen, I shall always accompany you, my honourable Master.
skins.secretaryIdle3: Achieving a balanced diet is essential for one's health. Therefore, although my cooking skill may be unsatisfactory to you, please do not forgo the meals I prepare, my honourable Master.
skins.secretaryTouch: Please refrain from intimate contact while others can see us, my honourable Master.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: If you wish for me to service you tonight, then... M-my apologies! I made a rather careless assumption...

skins.shipDescription: My dear, I changed into the new outfit as per your request. I would be most grateful were you to offer me words of praise, Master.
skins.acquisition: My dear, I changed into the new outfit as per your request. I would be most grateful were you to offer me words of praise, Master.
skins.details: No matter what clothing I wear, I am still your maid and live only to fulfill your expectations, my honourable Master.
skins.secretaryIdle1: Every single maid dreams of being able to stand beside her master in such a dress... Please forgive me for my presumptuousness...
skins.secretaryIdle2: This dress seems ill-suited for combat... but since it is your wish, Master, I shall humbly carry out your will.
skins.secretaryIdle3: This necklaces suits me well...? Thank you for praising this unworthy maid, my honourable Master.
skins.secretaryTouch: Oh, my Master who has intoxicated me with passions so, it is an honour to have been chosen as your dance partner.

skins.shipDescription: I've received ample advice from my colleagues in the Maid Team regarding swimwear etiquette. My honourable Master, are you pleased with my appearance?
skins.acquisition: I've received ample advice from my colleagues in the Maid Team regarding swimwear etiquette. My honourable Master, are you pleased with my appearance?
skins.login: No matter where we are, I shall do my utmost to keep you safe. My honourable Master, simply enjoy yourself, however you please.
skins.details: Worry not, for I have come prepared for every occasion. Food, drinks, magazines, sunscreen, contingency combat armaments, life-saving equipment, and... a cat? Why are you here? ...Oh, umm, I was just talking to myself!
skins.secretaryIdle1: My honourable Master, why are you staring at me so intently? Did this humble maid err somewhere?! ...I'm overthinking things...?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Swimming? If... if you wouldn't mind teaching me... Um, sorry, a lowly maid has no right to request your valuable time...
skins.secretaryIdle3: My honourable Master, are you tired? Something to rest on...? ...Um, if you wouldn't mind, then... feel free to use my body...!
skins.secretaryTouch: My honourable Master, allow me to protect you from the sun.
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Understood. If you would like to see me in a bikini, then... Is, is that so? I'm terribly sorry... I prematurely jumped to conclusions yet again.

skins.shipDescription: I have heard it is part of a maid's duties to dress to her honourable Master's liking over the holidays. Would this outfit happen to... satisfy the honourable Master's wishes?
skins.acquisition: I have heard it is part of a maid's duties to dress to her honourable Master's liking over the holidays. Would this outfit happen to... satisfy the honourable Master's wishes?
skins.login: Happy Lunar New Year, honourable Master. I have made a cup of tea for you.
skins.details: I made some Dragon Empery dishes, however they turned out quite... Pl-Please, do not be concerned! *This* year, I vow to make delectable food that shall suit the honourable Master's palate!
skins.secretaryIdle1: My honourable Master, if you'll forgive my asking, have you eaten any unusually shaped, unstuffed gyoza? ...P-Pardon me, I was merely wondering...
skins.secretaryIdle2: This naughty maid is deeply obliged to have the privilege of spending the holidays with her honourable Master.
skins.secretaryTouch: My perceptive Master, would there happen to be dust clinging to my dress...?
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: If you wish me to service you in these Dragon Empery garments, then... Oh, my apologies! I've made yet another careless assumption...
